name: Tai Lopez
description: Tai Lopez became well-known for his 'here in my garage' ads and philosophy-based wealth videos. While he has a large following, his CredCheck score reflects concerns about product quality and aggressive upsells.

name: Iman Gadzhi
description: Iman Gadzhi is a digital entrepreneur focused on teaching SMMA strategies. While successful, student outcomes are mixed and critiques focus on course repetition and overpricing.

name: Alex Hormozi
description: Alex Hormozi is known for his practical, no-BS approach to scaling businesses through Acquisition.com. Highly rated by entrepreneurs, his CredCheck score reflects high transparency and consistent value.

name: Grant Cardone
description: Grant Cardone is a real estate mogul and sales coach known for his 10X philosophy. Reviews are mixed with praise for energy and results but criticism over upsells and aggressiveness.

name: Dan Lok
description: Dan Lok promotes high-ticket sales and financial independence. Criticized for expensive upsells and marketing tactics, but praised for presentation and branding.

name: Vanessa Lau
description: Vanessa Lau teaches content creators and coaches how to grow on social media. Her CredCheck score reflects solid content and community trust, especially among early-stage entrepreneurs.

name: Sam Ovens
description: Founder of Consulting.com, Sam Ovens built his reputation through direct-response marketing. CredCheck score reflects high income claims and heavy marketing.

name: Ali Abdaal
description: Ali Abdaal creates content on productivity and learning. Known for transparent income reports and free YouTube education, his CredCheck score reflects high trust and value.
